Cabernet Sauvignon.Body Characteristics: Generous flavors of black raspberry, spicy currant, and blueberry compote with a structured finish.

Cabernet Sauvignon.Wine Name: Silver Oak Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon (2019)
Cabernet Sauvignon.Tannin Characteristics: Notes of red cherry, raspberry, blackberry, iris, vanilla, and clove. Linger of black currant and warm baking spices.
Cabernet Sauvignon.Body Characteristics: Black currants, ripe blackberry, and black cherry notes framed by velvety tannins with a long and complex finish.

Cabernet Sauvignon.Tannin Characteristics: Fresh fruit, bright acidity, hints of forest floor, bay leaf, rosemary, and soft pimento
Cabernet Sauvignon.Body Characteristics: Long and vibrant finish, flavors of black currant, ripe black cherries, and a hint of vanilla. Blend: 82% Cabernet Sauvignon, 11% Merlot, 5% Cabernet Franc, 2% Petit Verdot.

Cabernet Sauvignon.Tannin Source: Grapes from valley floor and hillsides
Cabernet Sauvignon.Body Characteristics: Dark color, rich fruit, layered aromas of cocoa, cassis, and ripe berries

Cabernet Sauvignon.Tannin Source: Grapes from Paso Robles, Central Coast, California
Cabernet Sauvignon.Body Characteristics: Bright with a deep ruby core, aromas of ripe black cherry, red berries, blackcurrant, spice notes of vanilla and cinnamon, fresh sage, subtle dried rose petal, toasted oak. Flavors of red plum, ripe bing cherry, blackberry, savory dried herbs, baking spice, toasted oak. Balanced, fine tannins. Complex finish with sustained ripe fruit, spice, dried flower, and camphor elements. Remarkably balanced and complex.

Cabernet Sauvignon.Wine Name: Silver Oak Alexander Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2019
Cabernet Sauvignon.Tannin Characteristics: Notes of red cherry, raspberry, blackberry, iris, vanilla, and clove. Linger of black currant and warm baking spices.
Cabernet Sauvignon.Body Characteristics: Ruby color, elegant wine with great acidity and lift on the mid-palate. Deep and fruity finish. Blend: 95.2% Cabernet Sauvignon, 2.5% Cabernet Franc, 1.9% Merlot, 0.4% Petit Verdot.

Cabernet Sauvignon.Tannin Characteristics: Fresh fruit, bright acidity, hints of forest floor, bay leaf, rosemary, and soft pimento
Cabernet Sauvignon.Body Characteristics: Long and vibrant finish, flavors of black currant, ripe black cherries, and a hint of vanilla. Blend: 82% Cabernet Sauvignon, 11% Merlot, 5% Cabernet Franc, 2% Petit Verdot.
